verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Command <WH6680> <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> that they put out <WH7971> of <WH4480> the camp <WH4264> every <WH3605> leper, <WH6879> and every one <WH3605> that hath an issue, <WH2100> and whosoever <WH3605> is defiled <WH2931> by the dead: <WH5315>

Both male <WH4480> <WH2145> and <WH5704> female <WH5347> shall ye put out, <WH7971> without <WH413> <WH4480> <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> shall ye put <WH7971> them; that they defile <WH2930> not <WH3808> <WH853> their camps, <WH4264> in the midst <WH8432> whereof <WH834> I <WH589> dwell. <WH7931>

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> so, <WH3651> and put them out <WH7971> <WH853> without <WH413> <WH4480> <WH2351> the camp: <WH4264> as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> so <WH3651> did <WH6213> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> When <WH3588> a man <WH376> or <WH176> woman <WH802> shall commit <WH6213> any <WH4480> <WH3605> sin <WH2403> that men <WH120> commit, to do <WH4603> a trespass <WH4604> against the LORD, <WH3068> and that <WH1931> person <WH5315> be guilty; <WH816>

Then they shall confess <WH3034> <WH853> their sin <WH2403> which <WH834> they have done: <WH6213> and he shall recompense <WH7725> his <WH853> trespass <WH817> with the principal <WH7218> thereof, and add <WH3254> unto <WH5921> it the fifth <WH2549> part thereof, and give <WH5414> it unto him against whom <WH834> he hath trespassed. <WH816>

But if <WH518> the man <WH376> have no <WH369> kinsman <WH1350> to recompense <WH7725> the trespass <WH817> unto, <WH413> let the trespass <WH817> be recompensed <WH7725> unto the LORD, <WH3068> even to the priest; <WH3548> beside <WH4480> <WH905> the ram <WH352> of the atonement, <WH3725> whereby <WH834> an atonement shall be made <WH3722> for <WH5921> him.

And every <WH3605> offering <WH8641> of all <WH3605> the holy things <WH6944> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> which <WH834> they bring <WH7126> unto the priest, <WH3548> shall be <WH1961> his.
And every man's <WH376> <WH853> hallowed things <WH6944> shall be <WH1961> his: whatsoever <WH834> any man <WH376> giveth <WH5414> the priest, <WH3548> it shall be <WH1961> his.
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> unto <WH413> them, If <WH3588> any man's <WH376> <WH376> wife <WH802> go aside, <WH7847> and commit <WH4603> a trespass <WH4604> against him,

And a man <WH376> lie <WH7901> with <WH854> her carnally, <WH7902> <WH2233> and it be hid <WH5956> from the eyes <WH4480> <WH5869> of her husband, <WH376> and be kept close, <WH5641> and she <WH1931> be defiled, <WH2930> and there be no <WH369> witness <WH5707> against her, neither <WH3808> she <WH1931> be taken <WH8610> with the manner;

And the spirit <WH7307> of jealousy <WH7068> come <WH5674> upon <WH5921> him, and he be jealous <WH7065> <WH853> of his wife, <WH802> and she <WH1931> be defiled: <WH2930> or <WH176> if the spirit <WH7307> of jealousy <WH7068> come <WH5674> upon <WH5921> him, and he be jealous <WH7065> <WH853> of his wife, <WH802> and she <WH1931> be not <WH3808> defiled: <WH2930>

Then shall the man <WH376> bring <WH935> <WH853> his wife <WH802> unto <WH413> the priest, <WH3548> and he shall bring <WH935> <WH853> her offering <WH7133> for <WH5921> her, the tenth <WH6224> part of an ephah <WH374> of barley <WH8184> meal; <WH7058> he shall pour <WH3332> no <WH3808> oil <WH8081> upon <WH5921> it, nor <WH3808> put <WH5414> frankincense <WH3828> thereon; <WH5921> for <WH3588> it <WH1931> is an offering <WH4503> of jealousy, <WH7068> an offering <WH4503> of memorial, <WH2146> bringing iniquity to remembrance. <WH2142> <WH5771>
And the priest <WH3548> shall bring her near, <WH7126> <WH853> and set <WH5975> her before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068>

And the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> holy <WH6918> water <WH4325> in an earthen <WH2789> vessel; <WH3627> and of <WH4480> the dust <WH6083> that <WH834> is <WH1961> in the floor <WH7172> of the tabernacle <WH4908> the priest <WH3548> shall take, <WH3947> and put <WH5414> it into <WH413> the water: <WH4325>

And the priest <WH3548> shall set <WH5975> <WH853> the woman <WH802> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> and uncover <WH6544> <WH853> the woman's <WH802> head, <WH7218> and put <WH5414> <WH853> the offering <WH4503> of memorial <WH2146> in <WH5921> her hands, <WH3709> which <WH1931> is the jealousy <WH7068> offering: <WH4503> and the priest <WH3548> shall have <WH1961> in his hand <WH3027> the bitter <WH4751> water <WH4325> that causeth the curse: <WH779>

And the priest <WH3548> shall charge her by an oath, <WH7650> <WH853> and say <WH559> unto <WH413> the woman, <WH802> If <WH518> no <WH3808> man <WH376> have lain <WH7901> with <WH854> thee, and if <WH518> thou hast not <WH3808> gone aside <WH7847> to uncleanness <WH2932> with another instead of <WH8478> thy husband, <WH376> be thou free <WH5352> from this <WH428> bitter <WH4751> water <WH4480> <WH4325> that causeth the curse: <WH779>

But if <WH3588> thou <WH859> hast gone aside <WH7847> to another instead of <WH8478> thy husband, <WH376> and if <WH3588> thou be defiled, <WH2930> and some man <WH376> have lain <WH5414> <WH853> <WH7903> with thee beside <WH4480> <WH1107> thine husband: <WH376>

Then the priest <WH3548> shall charge <WH7650> <WH853> the woman <WH802> with an oath <WH7621> of cursing, <WH423> and the priest <WH3548> shall say <WH559> unto the woman, <WH802> The LORD <WH3068> make <WH5414> thee a curse <WH423> and an oath <WH7621> among <WH8432> thy people, <WH5971> when the LORD <WH3068> doth make <WH5414> <WH853> thy thigh <WH3409> to rot, <WH5307> and thy belly <WH990> to swell; <WH6639>

And this <WH428> water <WH4325> that causeth the curse <WH779> shall go <WH935> into thy bowels, <WH4578> to make thy belly <WH990> to swell, <WH6638> and thy thigh <WH3409> to rot: <WH5307> And the woman <WH802> shall say, <WH559> Amen, <WH543> amen. <WH543>
And the priest <WH3548> shall write <WH3789> these <WH428> <WH853> curses <WH423> in a book, <WH5612> and he shall blot them out <WH4229> with <WH413> the bitter <WH4751> water: <WH4325>

And he shall cause <WH853> the woman <WH802> to drink <WH8248> <WH853> the bitter <WH4751> water <WH4325> that causeth the curse: <WH779> and the water <WH4325> that causeth the curse <WH779> shall enter <WH935> into her, and become bitter. <WH4751>

Then the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> <WH853> the jealousy <WH7068> offering <WH4503> out of the woman's <WH802> hand, <WH4480> <WH3027> and shall wave <WH5130> <WH853> the offering <WH4503> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> and offer <WH7126> it upon <WH413> the altar: <WH4196>

And the priest <WH3548> shall take a handful <WH7061> of <WH4480> the offering, <WH4503> even <WH853> the memorial <WH234> thereof, and burn <WH6999> it upon the altar, <WH4196> and afterward <WH310> shall cause <WH853> the woman <WH802> to drink <WH8248> <WH853> the water. <WH4325>

And when he hath made her to drink <WH8248> <WH853> the water, <WH4325> then it shall come to pass, <WH1961> that, if <WH518> she be defiled, <WH2930> and have done <WH4603> trespass <WH4604> against her husband, <WH376> that the water <WH4325> that causeth the curse <WH779> shall enter <WH935> into her, and become bitter, <WH4751> and her belly <WH990> shall swell, <WH6638> and her thigh <WH3409> shall rot: <WH5307> and the woman <WH802> shall be <WH1961> a curse <WH423> among <WH7130> her people. <WH5971>
And if <WH518> the woman <WH802> be not <WH3808> defiled, <WH2930> but be clean; <WH2889> then she shall be free, <WH5352> and shall conceive <WH2232> seed. <WH2233>
This <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> of jealousies, <WH7068> when <WH834> a wife <WH802> goeth aside <WH7847> to another instead of <WH8478> her husband, <WH376> and is defiled; <WH2930>

Or <WH176> when <WH834> the spirit <WH7307> of jealousy <WH7068> cometh <WH5674> upon <WH5921> him, and he be jealous <WH7065> <WH853> over his wife, <WH802> and shall set <WH5975> <WH853> the woman <WH802> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> and the priest <WH3548> shall execute <WH6213> upon her <WH853> all <WH3605> this <WH2063> law. <WH8451>
Then shall the man <WH376> be guiltless <WH5352> from iniquity, <WH4480> <WH5771> and this <WH1931> woman <WH802> shall bear <WH5375> <WH853> her iniquity. <WH5771>
